name: OnePlus Forums Blackified
description:
This is a fork from a theme I found here. I may make changes later on in case some panels look odd and I decide to implement more red into the whole OnePlus Red color-scheme.

Special thanks to y0ngc6 for making the original style. Link: https://userstyles.org/styles/134106/oneplus-forum-dark
additional_info:
Update 07.01.17 - fixed color for hyperlink being indistinguishable from normal text to OnePlus red.

Update 31.12.16 - fixed a minor color option, changed read/unread thread title colors to make them more distinguishable.
